data.title: A Note
data.meta_description: Polish poet Wislawa Szymborska (1923-2012) won the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1996.  This poem, "A Note", appeared in her 2005 collection, Monologue of a Dog.  I first saw it in the November 28, 2005 issue of The New Yorker magazine; I cut it out, put it in one of those magnetic Lucite photo frames…
